Detailed Description

template<unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM>
class CellAncestorWriter< ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM >

A class written using the visitor pattern for writing cell ages to file.

template<unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM>
double CellAncestorWriter< ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM >::GetCellDataForVtkOutput ( CellPtr  pCell,
AbstractCellPopulation< ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM > *  pCellPopulation 
) [inline, virtual]

Overridden GetCellDataForVtkOutput() method.

Get a double associated with a cell. This method reduces duplication of code between the methods VisitCell() and AddVtkData().

Parameters:
pCell a cell
pCellPopulation a pointer to the cell population owning the cell
Returns:
data associated with the cell
